title: Group portrait of groom wearing moustache, light colored bow tie, and light colored flower on left lapel, standing with bride, wearing tiara with long veil, earrings, light colored off the shoulder satin wedding dress with floral lace overlay on bust and embroidered design down front of full skirt with crinoline, holding Bible with flowers and ribbons, posed in front of altar of church with plants, candles, organ pipes, and stained glass windows, possibly for wedding at Park Place African Methodist Episcopal Church in Homestead
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
